page.title: 13Media in Springfield
page.content: The local{newspaper}for Springfield and the surrounding area is{The Fife {Herald.}The general items that go into the newspaper are everyday things that happen in the village, for example, what happens in the Community Council or the 200 club and also news items about sponsored walks, the Youth Club and what happens in the church. The number of items that go into the newspaper is normally about 2 or 3 and they have to be in by 1600 on Wednesday because that is the deadline. The reporter reports the news from Springfield village only, not all of our area. When the news has been taken to The Fife Herald they print it and publish it on the Friday.
